Detailed Description

template<class TNode>
class GBTree< TNode >

A simple binary tree (under construction)

template<class TNode >
GDList< TNode > * GBTree< TNode >::infixOrder ( )

Convert this binary tree to a linked list in infix order. This binary tree will be invalid after this operation. Caller need to delete the list after use

Referenced by GMultiSet< T >::ascendingOrder(), and GMultiSet< T >::decendingOrder().

template<class TNode>
void GBTree< TNode >::leftRotation ( TNode *&  t) [protected]

Perform left rotation

p t / \ right rotation / \ t c -------------> a p / \ <------------ / \ a b left rotation b c Precondition: right child of p is not NULL. Take O(1) time.

template<class TNode >
GDList< TNode > * GBTree< TNode >::prefixOrder ( )

Convert this binary tree to a linked list in prefix order. This binary tree will be invalid after this operation. Caller need to delete the list after use
